name: Rachel West
text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! We were needing some centerpieces for our Dunkin' Grand Opening at 2419 Acton Road, Vestavia Hills, AL, and what we got was above and beyond what we were expecting. This is our second time using them for a Grand Opening and a second time we were incredibly happy! The team was easy to work with and they went above and beyond to help us!

name: Jonathan Fudge
text:
The Rainbow Balloon Company is our go-to balloon decor company in Birmingham, Alabama and we absolutely LOVE their work. Whether we are trying to book a client for organic garland or for the every growing in popularity yard decor, they are amazing to work with. I highly recommend them.

They even offer YARD CARDS! We are so excited to have found them and been able to work with them. Our staff ran into them at a convention where the owner of The Rainbow Balloon Company was winning first place after first place awards for her balloons. Well deserved! If you found this company, consider yourself lucky and give them a call. You won't find anyone better in the greater Birmingham area.

name: Cliff Jones
text: I was referred to The Rainbow Balloon Company by a friend and used them for my wife's 40th Birthday. Not only did they do a PHENOMENAL JOB, but their customer service was top notch and everything was handled in a very professional manner!  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them for any occasion!  You wont be disappointed!

name: Jessica Lee Ramos
text: Jessica and Mary did an amazing job setting up a birthday display for my twin boys turning 10.  They will work with you to get everything just right with balloon colors to coordinate with the yard signs.  Super friendly!  I will definitely refer them to my friends and plan to use them again. Thank you Rainbow Balloon Company!

name: Arturo Briseno Jr
text: With everyone being stuck at home for COVID (so no classroom birthday parties), we wanted to do something special for our little one's birthday this year.  We ordered a Classic Celebration Marquis from The Rainbow Balloon Company and loved it.  They offer different services but for us the marquis was perfect...  something a little different (and in her favorite colors) to brighten up her day.  Highly recommend checking them out!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We hope your daughter had a great birthday!!!

name: Julie Bean
text: Fantastic experience working with these fun, talented women! They make the whole process...from planning to delivery/setup....efficient and easy. Their work is beautiful. Highly recommend!

name: Sandra Remington
text: So easy to work with and very responsive! Yard signs and balloons looked wonderful and added such a special cheer to our birthday boy’s day. We will definitely be using them again!

name: Kristin Bundren
text: We love Rainbow Balloon Company! We have ordered from them twice this year (a birthday and New Years) and the balloons were fabulous! The balloon art adds a fun, colorful, and festive touch. Great communication and product! We are looking forward to more in the future!!

name: Olivia Horan
text: If you come to any Diamonds Direct event and see our gorgeous balloon garlands -- these ladies need to get all the credit! Fabulous job every time, and they have a knack for bringing your visions to life :) Highly recommend for any event, big or small!

resp.text: Always a pleasure working with you!!! :D

name: Ashlee Ammons
text:
I found this awesome company after a Google search, I wanted to surprise my Mom with something positive on my Grandmothers 1st birthday following her passing this year.  Although they are known for celebratory occasions they really worked with me to create something with the appropriate tone to make my Mom feel special on an otherwise somber day.  My Mom was deeply touch by this and cried and smiled all weekend long.  The ladies at RBC were wonderful to work with, I accidentally gave them the incorrect address to the house and they communicated with me quickly and got it set and delivered the WOW
as promised!  I would highly recco them, if I need anything further, they will be my 1st call!  Last, they just kinda seem like awesome humans, they were kind, friendly and personable throughout!

name: ShuMarri Jennings
text: They were very professional. They all had great attitudes and the great work ethic. They made sure our event was everything we imagined.

name: Magic City Cheer & Tumble
text: Great company! Easy to work with- gave us exactly what we asked for. Great product.

name: Amanda Austin
text: Very responsive, easy to work with, and did a wonderful job decorating our yard for our daughter's birthday!

name: Deidra K. Diaz
text: I am so thankful I got a Facebook recommendation to use the Rainbow Balloon Company!   Your creativity and decor is SO MUCH better than just having big letters on the lawn.  The custom colors, bright and vivid design and personal touch was exactly what we wanted to celebrate my Mom's 71st Birthday during the Covid-19 pandemic.  I can't say THANK YOU enough, with a special nod to Chandler who was exceptional customer servixe!   Wow...your company is amazing!

name: Ann Katherine Hardeman
text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Mickey Berry
text: This was such a cool place when it was in the old location! It’s ok now, but you used to be able to go in there and find anything and everything!  I think it’s more of a craft store now? The people were nice and the gentleman who helped us was very courteous.  I just didn’t find it to be like it used to be.  We’ll give it another chance!

name: Katrina Gamble Parker
text: Great place to get unique gifts and old fashioned toys for kids!

name: S Taylor
text: I bring my kids up here with me and we love this store. You can find just about anything your creative mind can conjure up.

name: Susan Woods-Ross
text: Always amazing!!! Mary Ann has the God given ability to remember most everyone who has brought their children in by name and watched our children grow up. She is truly one of a kind. We all love her!

name: Claude Freeman
text: Truly a place for a person that has everything- but not a bird whistle, or a bullet box to put remotes in. Did I mention they have seasonal stuff? Great old toys too! Highly recommend this place.

name: Kursten Terrell
text: Been coming here sonce I was a child. This is my happy place!!

name: Izz Noland
text: Great place to get all kinds of old knick knacks. They were the only place around still receiving and selling solar eclipse glasses, and opened days and hours they normally would not.

resp.text: It was truly our pleasure...thank you SO much!

name: Michael Annunziata
text: Lots of cool little things to find here. I always drop by to find stocking stuffers for Christmas

name: LA Huffstutler
text: Great for finding something different and it supported community vendor.

name: Zoe Read
text: Not a good variety store. Lots of unorganized or empty shelves.

name: Kevin Nelson
text: Wonderful store to find hard to find gifts

name: Tania
text: This place is great

name: Jessie Bunton
text: Wide variety of odds and ends, kinda pricey

name: Stuart Jinnette
text: Has a wide varity

name: Cynthia Poree
text: When I went to Dollar General there was hardly anything in the store. Most of the merchandise was moved around and l had a hard time finding what I needed. Nothing in the freezers. There were stocking papers taped everywhere. Maybe they are just changing everything and I went at the wrong time.☹️

name: Tiffany Carter
text: My new favvv Dollar General. It's super clean. Variety of items

name: Lisa Bonds
text: This is the nicest, cleanest abd well stocked Dollar General I have shopped. I pray it stays thus way!!! Staff is very friendly and helpful. Hwy 80 location in Alabama is we worth the trip to shop.

name: NMG Reesi
text: Need to clean up the store and organize better

name: Helen Krall
text: Closes at 9 not 10. Sucks when you're not from here and you depend on Google to get correct times.

name: Amanda Stubbs
text: This is by far one of the nicest DG's I have been too. Super nice employees as well.

name: Shanequa Peoples
text: Very clean, very organized, friendly staff.

name: J Doss (SweetPea166)
text: Great customer service and shopping experience in a clean environment! Glad to have it in our community!!

name: Andrea Harris
text: Love it

name: Mack Nelson
text: Cool

name: Henrietta Cargill
text: A wide variety of mdse

name: Keary Rudolph
text: Great Store & Perfect location..

name: Susie Gibbs
text: Clean and friendly

name: Lois Laister
text: Nice staff

name: Curstina Moorer
text: Clean

name: Sandy De La Fuente
text: I just came to this store 1 minute ago(friday 13, Aug @ 2:00 o’clock)I was going to pay my merchandise with a 50.00dollar bill , and the lady at the register toll me they cannot brake 50 dollars bills , and I was not disappointed, I understand that. I nicely suggested to put a sign at the door so other people will know, and the MANAGER answered me “NOO We can’t do that “ so rude! Never coming to this store again, Never!

name: Teresa Ellenburg
text: You can find lots of craft ideas in there. I love it.

name: stevins jones
text: IT'S BAD WHEN YOU'RE IN THE STORE AND A LITTLE KID COMES IN THAT HAS AUTSUM AND YOU'RE EMPLOYEES MAKE FUN OF HIM WHEN THEY WALK OUT THE DOOR. WONT BE DOING BUSSINSS WITH YALL ANYMORE.

name: Josh B.
text: Nice staff, normal dollar tree selection.

name: Shannon Gordon
text: Love love love this store

name: Camille&Ben Richardson
text: The store is very clean and kept up I enjoy shopping there and you will too if you try it

name: Nancy Meadows
text: Cheap place to go everything under 1$ greetings cards are 2 for 1$  clean friendly worker

name: Sandi Allen
text: This Dollar Tree is one of the cleanest and well-organized stores that I have been in, in this area.  It by far beats the ones in Guntersville and Boaz.  The staff is very friendly and helpful!

name: Valerie Hamilton
text: Two Little Peanuts is a family- party rental business, with great service. Has use them for years with no complaints. Thank you guys! for all you do. (FPM Activity Director)

name: Paigey Who
text:
Best party experience ever!
Two Little Peanuts is a family- oriented party rental business that made my baby party a blast. This family brought nothing but smiles to my children faces. Their featured item are the waterslides that are so much fun! Reasonable prices and great attitudes.

name: Rebecca
text: Totally lack of professionalism!! An appointment was set to meet, so that the owner may collect her deposit......but as the time approached no one answered the phone. I attempted days after, and even as the date of the event approached and still no response. A phone call or text to let me know that she renege would have been suitable. I would NOT recommend or ever refer this place to anyone!!!!

name: P V
text: They were professional and kind. Great services!

name: DeShawn Whittle
text: Nice

name: Amy Tadlock
text: Great for a child birthday party. Limited choice on the different jumps but great for children.

name: Jay Friday
text: Jumps A Lot is awesome!  I had my daughters 6th birthday party there. We have been to all the bounce houses in the area and Jumps A Lot is by far the best. The inflatables are better than any other around and all the kids loved it!  Some of the other parents commented on how clean the inflatables were. The staff did a great job and most important all the kids had a blast.  I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

name: Brianna Payne
text: I ordered an inflatable for my son's 5th birthday party! There was a slight mix up, but the manager resolved it in what has to be record time! The gentleman who delivered the jump was so nice and accomaditing to make sure I pleased and everything was good to go! Not only that, but the inflatable was CLEAN! Having ordered 2 before from a different company, I expected the normal sweeping and need for a wipe down, but this one needed nothing! I FULLY recommend Jumps-A-Lot, their equipment, and their staff to anyone searching to rent an inflatable for a party! For anyone wondering, we used the 5-in-1 Combo and it is AWESOME!

name: Kathryn Lee
text: Fun for the kids most games did not work and the 2 helpers did not seem to happy to help and didn't get mich help from them

name: Jennifer Williams
text: Fun but a lot of the games were out of order

name: Kenneth Concilio
text: My daughter loves the place!

name: AleishaDavisDesigns TheSableBelle
text: Great location for parties!

name: Crystal Mcdaneld
text: More then half the games didn't work and the ones that did took your money

name: D Wayne
text: I like the Dollar Tree at Red Bay. The employee is really nice and helpful. The merchandise is a little unorganized, but what do you expect when one person is running the register and stocking the shelves. Other than this, I really enjoy my visits there. I always find some good stuff there.

name: Kim McCalpin
text: Our Dollar tree in Red Bay Alabama doesn't get as good as stuff as other dollar trees. Recently I have noticed the Dollar General next door is getting Dollar tree items and selling them anywhere from three to five dollars each the exact items that are advertised as a Dollar tree also that other Dollar trees get. How is this happening? You said we could buy a piece of foam board at Dollar tree for a dollar they have been out for a month or longer at Dollar General they have it for $5 a sheet that's just one example. Sincerely, Kim

name: Charlie_straz
text: It was well. There were tons of items to choose from and I fount lots of craft supplies. However, there were a good bit of people in there, but it is redbay. So, it's kinda expected to be crowded.

name: Charles Mcmurphy
text: Lots of products but the store seems dirty and cluttered

name: Karen Ball
text: Well stocked. Lots to choose from

name: Denise Rodgers
text:
The employee are very nice, and go out of their way to help you.
Love our Red Bay Dollar Tree

name: Garvie Word
text: Always a wide variety of merchandise & products to choose from.

name: S A
text: Everything was clean. Great variety of products.

name: Olga Aguirre
text:
(Translated by Google) Everything I love about the dollar tree is my favorite store

(Original)
Todo me.encanta del dollar tree es mi tienda favorita

name: Victoria Walker
text: 6/15/21 Standing in line to get checked out...the man left and I walked up putting my stuff on the counter. The young, tattoed girl saw me and just walked off. I thought she was getting something and coming right back. Waiting, waiting look around and she is cleaning the door glass. Walked over to the manager and said that is pretty sad workmanship....customers come first, not too mention that was pretty rude!

name: trey werneth
text: Been to this dollar general many times to pick up something for the kids and after i get it home its out of date. Yesterday was it for me I bought some prune juice for my 7 month old and we gave her some and then my wife called me today and said it was expired December of 2020

name: Donna Larner
text: Always friendly and courteous. Always have items in stock that I want for

name: Alice Freeman
text: Fast service Friendly Employees

name: N Smith
text: Very clean, good selection and variety, courteous and friendly staff every time I go in.

name: Bonnie Palmer
text: I already Have!!  Store Manager needs to Learn how to Work!!  Plus GET TELEPHONE FIXED. Otherwise that Store will be closing faster than it Opened. Just thank goodness I'm only here visiting.  I just feel for   the Locals.    Just Thank the Lord there's Eddies right down the Street.

name: Teresa Morris
text: I love this store!!!! The employees are so nice.  They keep a well stocked store .

name: Dane Bishop
text: The keyholder must not have a brain an dependent and can not think for herself. Had a return item with receit and told me she couldn't do the return.  Had to wait for a store manager. I'm not off work for a store manager.

name: Tonya Coleman
text: Excellent customer service!!

name: Russell Coxwell
text: None of the shelves are ever stocked and its rare someone is at the front counter I go there daily today I had to walk out with my merchandise because after 5 minutes I never once saw a worker in there but as I said none of the shelves were stocked so what part of there job do they do there

name: Nancy Wilson
text: They always have what I need.

name: Edward Hurlbert
text: Great place to shop for deals

name: Judy Jones
text: Very nice employees.  Clean store

name: christopher patterson

text: Wow! Because of the covid-19 virus we decided to have a drive-by birthday party for my mom's 75th! The folks at Birmingham flamingo a friend really came through and made my mom's 75th birthday one she won't forget! Sometime during the night before the party come out while she was fast asleep, the flamingo ninjas transformed my mom's front yard into a festive party Paradise! The displayed really looked phenomenal! Everyone loved the flamingos and flowers especially my mom! I will be highly recommending flamingo a friend to all of my friends! Who can I flamingo next?

text: I placed an order for my sisters birthday this Saturday online, it was super easy to place.  Unfortunately I found out my sister would be out of town for her birthday.  I called to cancel, figuring I would only get a partial refund.  They were so nice, refunded the full amount.  I will definitely use them in the future just for the customer service!

text: You guys did a FANTASTIC job setting up a huge yard display for my mom’s 70th birthday!  Everyone loved it, and all of her neighbors stopped by to say happy birthday.  I scheduled everything online and it was super easy!  Put up and take down we’re both very discrete and timely, as promised.  Thanks!

text: Due to Covid, we had to cancel our child's birthday party.  Instead we had a drive by birthday parade.  We requested the "Smiley faces".  The Smileys were a big hit!!!  The company did a wonderful job setting up the display.  I would highly recommend them!

name: Breanicia Turner
text: Not only was I racially profiled a couple months back by an employee named India. India who is always on her phone ringing up customers, snarling at people she doesn't like, and just being plain rude. Tonight I went in and asked where I could find a green polo shirt bc I planned on being India for Halloween to make light of a situation that really hurt my feelings. To be followed around a store bc of the color of my skin. So to make matters worse after asking Carrie the manager where I could find a polo she told me the thrift store. So then I told her I was going to be India . Carrie was furious. She berated me and told me and all the other customers in the store it was their job to follow people that are stealing around dollar tree as if I was stealing . She yelled that India was doing her job and that it didn't matter which color the person was. Making it seem as if I am a thief. I'm in total disbelief bc I've known Carrie the manager for years. But the way she acted and talked to me tonight amongst other shoppers was ridiculous, mentally scarring, and just plain bad for business. I literally shop in dollar tree every single day. But this could all be changed very soon . Thanks to Carrie having a bad day. Then to make the situation my worst yet this year. I was apologizing to the cashier ringing me up telling her I knew the objectives of their job bc I was offered a management position about a year ago and had a application for the job in my car . Carrie the manager walks out and tells me to shut up and that the conversation is basically over. I said Carrie I was not talking to you I was speakkng to the cashier. I think it's sad when a person brings their personal life to work. I know Carrie has problems at home. So I told her I didn't know what she bad going on but I knew this wasn't her . Bottom line I won't be back to filbert ferry dollar tree for a while.

They have a small craft section, soaps, cleaner, kitchen items, socks, etc.

name: Meemaw Brown
text: Staff member forced me and my lady to wear masks, believe her name was MJ , while not wearing hers or making other customers wear a mask. I was told I wasn't going to be allowed to enter without mask yet the employee herself wasn't wearing hers nor were other customers forced as we were. Hypocrisy at its finest.

resp.text: Meemaw, we sincerely apologies for this incident. Our policy is to follow current government mandates and require that everyone in the store wears masks. If staff was not complying and enforcing this policy selectively we will be sure to look into it and make the necessary changes. I can assure you this will not happen again. The manager then accused her of shoplifting and admitted to following them around the store. After my daughter willingly allowed her to look in her purse, finding nothing, the manager still called the police. My daughter stayed and waited on the police asking to see any video showing her shoplifting. The police officer then examined her purse and found nothing.The police officer asked them to leave and said that the manager did not want them to return to the store. I'm a little confused because I did not know that you could be banned from a store for trying to spend money, because my silly daughter was still wanting to purchase the costume.The manager never apologized or admitted to being mistaken, but she did say "that she know what "you people" do and that she was going to jail and told my 9 year old that she and her niece were going to DHR." I'm glad that the people that had these great  experiences were not the "you people"  that steal. I do not recommend that people of color shop at this store our money is no good there. name: Lyn Fields
text: Rented a "mister" fan for our sons birthday, and luckily we tried it out before using with our guests. Bc only 2 the nozzles worked properly and had valves.  The water was spraying directly into the fan motor.  So my husband did his best to fix it with no luck.  The fan itself was very beat up and barely a difference between low and high.  Upon returning the fan a manager told my husband only $10 of our $60 could be refunded.  Also admitted there were new mister kitsch the back but the guys didn't want to install them...

resp.text: Mrs. Fields, I apologize for the problems that you experienced. I have investigated this incident and I discovered that it was a new 'Mister Kit' that was on your fan, but unfortunately it was malfunctioning. Upon return of the fan we offered your husband a refund, but he said to charge him for the fan, "Because the fan worked and we used it." Well, the 42 inch Fan rents for $50 and the Mister Kit addition is only $10 - hence the $10 refund. Again, I apologize to you for the malfunctioning Mister Kit.  I would love the opportunity to make it up to you by offering you a full $60 credit toward any future rental item. Mistakes happen, but we want to make it right with you!

text: I paid $1207 to rent a E35 excavator and while using the machine a fitting by the cylinder got a hole knocked in it. The cylinder itself didn’t bust it was just the fitting. They charged me for a cylinder to be replaced when only the fitting needed replacing. I should’ve carried it to whom I deal with because Alabama Rental charged me $586.00 for a cylinder when a fitting could’ve been replaced. I was under the impression when renting equipment that covered small issues that’s the point of renting the equipment and I wouldn’t have minded covering the fitting because that’s what busted but having to pay for the whole cylinder was unprofessional by the business. I will not rent from there again and if you do just be prepared for them to charge your card for parts you don’t damage.

name: Bob Hardy
text:
Rented a trailer to pick up a 3500# tractor.  On the way back, one of the tires came apart.  I pulled into a gas station and called them.  I was told they had no spare tires and I needed to pull the trailer back on three tires.  I cut off the loose part and limped it back across town driving no faster than 25mph.

When I arrived at the center, I explained what happened at the front desk.  I was told tires are the renters responsibilities.  The guy on the phone implied differently.  Normally, I would agree, but the tire in question was clearly dry rotted along with the others.  The guy at the front desk told me previous renters could have put bad tires on?  Prior to me leaving, they made sure the tires were fully inflated.  I suspect they knew the tires were questionable in the first place.  When I called him out on the dry rot, he started back pedaling.  He agreed not to charge me.

I like Alabama Rental normally, but this experience clearly was questionable.

name: Amos Elmore
text: This is a good group. I rented a two man auger from them for use over the 4th of July weekend. They had the best price in town, helped me get it loaded and were thorough in going over the best way to use it. Unfortunately the auger developed an oil leak during use and I had to discontinue using it. When I returned it to them Tuesday I explained what happened and how I had to rent another auger from a different supplier. They were understanding of the inconvenience and we reached a completely fair agreement on a partial refund. I will definitely make these folks my first choice for any rental needs I have in the future.

name: Pamela Lee
text: Please be sure and watch carefully when trying to use coupons or get your $5.00 a week off. I think I have it figured out, and then get up to the register to only find out they add some discounts in BEFORE the tax is added, the it does not add up to $25.00, so you don't get the additional $5.00 off. When you're stuck in line, with alot of people behind you, you're on the hook to just pay and leave. They do not help you with this either, and most times the buy so much, get so much off does not work at checkout, and 9 times out of 10, the sale prices are not marked in the store,  so you don't even know you're getting them until you look at your ticket.  It takes alot of work and time to save money at Dollar General using the app coupons. If you can figure it out, it might be worth it, but be careful, you will end up spending far more than you want to, and that's no deal !!!!

name: notthebeesxoxo
text: The people are amazing, always nice, the store is always organized without any issues. But within the last few months, their ac has been broken and they will not fix it. They are forcing their employees to work in a building that is hotter than 90° and only giving them little fans to cool them off. Within 5 mins of being in the store, I was sweating. I am here all the time and have noticed over months that nothing is being done. Until you guys fix your air and prove to your employees that you care about them and their health, I won't be back. And I will make sure the many people I know who live in this area know how your employees are treated. This is disgusting. Wrong. Unethical. I could go on. What's crazy is they have 3 signs up saying they need managers, stockers and cashier's. I WONDER WHY. Paying employees $7.25 to stand in 90° weather. Despicable!!!

name: Anna Beavers
text:
We live right around the corner from this Dollar Tree.
We are remodeling our home ourselves and therefore we visit the store several times a week. Every employee knows our names and they are quick to help us out in any way possible.
But it's not just us, every employee always has a smile for every customer, and they go out of their way to help find something that a customer may be looking for.
They should all get an A + for customer service and knowledge of their store.

I have been to other Dollar Tree stores, and I was disappointed in the customer service, as there was none. The employees were standing around, obviously supposed to be working, and after standing in line for several minutes, with no acknowledgement from any employee, I asked to be checked out, and the MANAGER sighed and acted like she was doing me a favor by ringing me up.
As insulting as that was, there was an employee leaning on the customer side of the register, and he had a Mountain Dew, and she rang him up before me. He realized that he didn't have any money, and the MANAGER was about to void it out, and I smiled and said," I'll pay for it."
Needless to say, I will never go back to the Pelham Dollar Tree again.

I pointed that out to say this, you will NEVER find employees hanging around at the Valleydale store. If they are at work, they are working.
If they are stocking the aisles and they notice a line forming, someone will run and open another register.
After being in the retail sales business for over 30 years, I can honestly say that I would hire your entire team.
